name: Fleeing the elevator
description: Character Stickman is in the elevator guarded. The elevator is stuck and you need to find two successful ways to escape from this elevator. Stick found a suitcase with objects at the electrician. Use all the items to escape from the elevator. On the way you are waiting for various difficulties and dangers. Many puzzles, for example, you will need to collect items for a while and choose the right action. You are waiting for mini-games, such as puzzles. In the game, shootouts, fights, and even golf are expected. This is not an escape from prison, but an escape from an elevator.
